Item.name: Pirate Exosuit
Item.description: A heavily modified exosuit. It seems some pirates are quite crafty and managed to increase the stun resistance of this exosuit and allow the user to breath hull oxygen if available.

Item.name: Damaged Pirate Exosuit Parts
Item.description: Damaged parts from a modified pirate exosuit.
